snippet: No Labels, the political group seeking to defy the gravitational force of Washington partisanship, has a new approach for bringing President Obama and a Republican Congress together for the next two years.
abstract: No Labels, the political group seeking to defy the gravitational force of Washington partisanship, has a new approach for bringing President Obama and a Republican Congress together for the next two years.

headline.main: Urging Parties to Come Together by Not Splitting the Difference
